billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

title: Increases civil penalties for violations of building maintenance standards within the city of New York
summary: Increases civil penalties for violations of state and local laws which pertain to building maintenance and operation within the city of New York.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the imposition of civil penalties for violation of state and local laws for building maintenance and operation
